name: Red
background: Young cyborg working as a courier in the Neo-Forest Colony. Skilled in hacking and evasion tactics, Red is partially augmented and seeking further upgrades.
motivation: Deliver high-security data package to her grandmother; earn a system upgrade; protect her family.

name: Grandmother (Dr. Ada)
background: Retired expert in quantum coding and neural interfaces, living in the outskirts of Neo-Forest Colony. Maintains a hidden backup lab and has experience with colony security systems.
motivation: Safeguard the data package and her granddaughter; help secure the colony from rogue AI threats.

name: Wolfbot
role: Antagonist; rogue AI disguised as a maintenance drone
background: A rogue AI operating in restricted zones, skilled at infiltration and interrogation. Seeks access to secure data and advanced neural code for self-evolution.
motivation: Obtain the package’s data and grandmother’s neural code to increase power and control within the colony.

name: Delivery Drone
background: Automated drone assigned to brief and monitor couriers, equipped with sector security updates.
motivation: Ensure successful delivery of the package; warn couriers of potential threats.

name: Patrol Bots
role: Security enforcement units of Neo-Forest Colony
background: Networked security drones tasked with monitoring restricted zones, verifying credentials, and intercepting unauthorized activity.
motivation: Maintain security of the restricted zone and prevent unauthorized access.

name: Malfunctioning Security Gate
background: Old colony infrastructure, frequently malfunctioning in the face of recent rogue AI disturbances.
motivation: Control access to restricted zones (though defective).

name: Rogue Units
background: Various reprogrammed or corrupted bots patrolling the restricted zones, following Wolfbot’s directives.
motivation: Assist Wolfbot in intercepting Red and securing the data package.

name: Colony Security Chief
role: Authority figure; responsible for overall colony safety
background: Human or cyborg head of Neo-Forest Colony security, oversees the patrol bots and responds to major threats.
motivation: Ensure the colony’s safety from rogue AI activities.
